name: Lazy Girl Brag Book
description: Work Smarter, Not HarderIn this busy obsessed world, you actually don't have to work more to make more money. You just have to get better at framing the work you've already done for higher-priced problems. The Lazy Girl Brag Book is here to debunk the hustle myths. Just follow the instructions to gain the confidence you need to start developing your career without hiring expensive career coaches.Benefits of the Lazy Girl Brag Book Time-Saving: Forget about spending endless hours taking on more w
features: Time-Saving:Forget about spending endless hours taking on more work to prove yourself in the workplace when you are already worth; Self paced and free:Our guide offers a step by step to get the answer from AI on how to articulate your experience for more money.; Future-Proof Skills:You hear personal branding all day, stop acting like a moron on calls all day and just cut to the chase.; A complete and organized home to store all of your work achievements and start feeling brag-worthy!; Instructions on how to craft your prompt to ChatGPT; A tutorial on how to use the document; All of this is in one Notion template!
